speech:
•	Drench the plants with IMAXI mixed at 15 ml per 20ltrs water to protect against wireworms and grubs.
•	Crop rotation and mulching are important in preventing build-up of pest populations
•	Spray JACKPOT at 12.5 ml/20ltrs water, repeated after 3 days to control aphids.
•	alternate ALPHASIN and IMAXI, and ensure the block is free from bushy foliage around the perimeter
•	spray immediately with ROMECTIN 10ml and IMAXI 12.5ml in 20ltrs water after the Tuta Absoluta pest has attacked your crop.
